bedding@treehouse.name: bedding
bedding@treehouse.examine:
Although it's nice, thick, warm bedding, it's hardly the ideal thing in which
to practice honeymoon tactics!

way1@treehouse.name: Way1
way1@treehouse.examine:
The waybread is the traditional feed of elves when travelling, they call it
lembas.  It is said to refresh the weary traveler greatly.
way1@treehouse.desc[0]: Some waybread has been put here.

waybread@treehouse.name: waybread
waybread@treehouse.examine:
The waybread is the traditional feed of elves when travelling, they call it
lembas.  It is said to refresh the weary traveler greatly.
waybread@treehouse.desc[0]: Some waybread has been put here.

shield@treehouse.name: shield
shield@treehouse.examine: It looks too big to protect you from diseases, but might help in a fight!
shield@treehouse.desc[0]: A small shield has been left here.

ladder@treehouse.desc[1]: A rope leads down the tree.
ladder@treehouse.name: ladder
ladder@treehouse.desc[2]: A knotted rope leads down the tree.
ladder@treehouse.desc[0]: A rope ladder leads down the tree.

amulet@treehouse.name: amulet
amulet@treehouse.examine: The amulet is polished gold on a leather necklace.
amulet@treehouse.desc[0]: An unadorned gold amulet has been put here.

house@treehouse.title: Tree House
house@treehouse.description:
You are standing in the center of an elven treehouse.  Arched doorways
between the branches lead north, east and south.

porch@treehouse.title: Treehouse Porch
porch@treehouse.description:
You stand on the porch of the treehouse.  A way leads west through the
branches into the center of the treehouse.

south@treehouse.title: Treehouse South
south@treehouse.description:
You are at the southern end of the treehouse, which appears to be used by
its occupant for a sleeping area.  Large amounts of thick &+Cbedding&* insure that
its occupant will be comfortable even in bad weather.  A single way leads north
between the branches.

north@treehouse.title: Treehouse North
north@treehouse.description:
You stand at the north end of the treehouse, looking out across the forest.
A single doorway carved into the treetrunk allows access back south.

elf@treehouse.name: elf
elf@treehouse.description: A tall, lean elf steps quietly amid the shadows.
